name: Rhythm Explosion
description:
We are sorry that the game hasn’t be finished,but you can see the final work on the right side.

This is a rhythm game that combines the turn-based system. The two players press the beat on rhythm to select the skills in the current round. 

Be sure you press it on the right beat , or you will miss it! 

CONTROLS

1P: "Z" or "X"

2P: "." or "/"
